entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , Owen Sound
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:10 AM EST Thursday 19 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -0.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Wiarton Airport 3:37 PM EST Thursday 19 January 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -0.3°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.1 kPa falling
Visibility: 2.8 km
Humidity: 94 %
Wind Chill: -6
Dewpoint: -1.1°C
Wind: E 21 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of drizzle mixed with freezing drizzle. Low minus 3. POP 60%
entry.summary: Snow or ice pellets mixed with freezing rain ending early this evening then cloudy and 60 percent chance of drizzle or freezing drizzle changing to 60 percent chance of flurries overnight. Risk of freezing drizzle overnight. Fog patches developing early this evening and dissipating overnight. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming north 30 before morning. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Thursday 19 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 3. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Risk of freezing drizzle early in the morning. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light in the afternoon. Temperature steady near minus 3. Wind chill near minus 9. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Thursday 19 January 2023
